title: Special Recent Posts PRO Edition v3.0.7 - WordPress Plugins
description:
Special Recent Posts PRO Edition is one of the most advanced Wordpress plugin to manage your posts with thumbnails. With an incredible easy configuration and a wonderful look, you're just a click away from setting up your awesome layout. It's the perfect solution for Web Magazines or just Simple Blogs and it comes with more than 120 Customization Options Available. Contains external links.

To install:
1. Upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
